price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߓߊ߯ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߠߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߣߊߡߎ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߓߌ߯
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
